id.game_description1: Uji pengetahuan dan ketajaman matamu dalam game tebak-tebakan yang menyenangkan ini.
id.game_description2: Kamu akan diberikan gambar atau kata yang diacak dan petunjuk. Tebaklah dengan benar dalam batas waktu dan kesempatan!
id.incorrect_message_no_attempts: Kesempatan habis! Jawaban yang benar adalah: "{correctAnswer}".
id.game_complete_message: Selamat! Kamu telah menyelesaikan semua tebakan! Skor akhirmu: {correctCount} Benar, {incorrectCount} Salah.
id.error_loading_game: Gagal memuat game. Silakan coba lagi.
id.question: Teenieping apa ini?

en.game_description1: Test your knowledge and sharp eyes in this fun guessing game.
en.game_description2: You'll be given a picture or scrambled word and a clue. Guess correctly within the time and attempts provided!
en.incorrect_message_no_attempts: Attempts exhausted! The correct answer is: "{correctAnswer}".
en.game_complete_message: Congratulations! You've completed all guesses! Your final score: {correctCount} Correct, {incorrectCount} Incorrect.
en.error_loading_game: Failed to load game. Please try again.
en.question: What is this Teenieping?
